Nothing.title: Nothing
Nothing.description: Parent type for all falsy values.

NotFound.title: NotFound
NotFound.description: Value returned by lookup functions in case nothing is found.

Stop.title: Stop
Stop.description: Value used to stop iterationin .each() and similar functions.

Something.title: Something
Something.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Box.title: Box
Box.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

BoxSet.title: BoxSet
BoxSet.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

RBox.title: RBox
RBox.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

IntervalBox.title: IntervalBox
IntervalBox.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Model.title: Model
Model.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Stream.title: Stream
Stream.description: Parent type for all non falsy values.

Obj.title: Obj
Obj.description: Parent type for all composite types.

Single.title: Single
Single.description: Parent type for all single value types.

Num.title: Num
Num.description: Parent type for all single value types.

Router.title: Router
Router.description: Parent type for all composite types.

WindowRouter.title: WindowRouter
WindowRouter.description: Parent type for all composite types.

Cat.title: Cat
